```{r}
tma1 <- readRDS("~/export/merfish2/merfishTMA1_annotated.rds")
tma2 <- readRDS("~/export/merfish2/merfishTMA2_annotated.rds")
tma3 <- readRDS("~/export/merfish2/merfishTMA3_annotated.rds")

```

```{r}
print(tma1) 
print(tma2) 
print(tma3)
```

```{r}
num_cells_tma1 <- ncol(tma1)
num_cells_tma2 <- ncol(tma2)
num_cells_tma3 <- ncol(tma3)

# Calculate the total number of cells
total_cells <- num_cells_tma1 + num_cells_tma2 + num_cells_tma3

cat("Number of cells in TMA1:", num_cells_tma1, "\n")
cat("Number of cells in TMA2:", num_cells_tma2, "\n")
cat("Number of cells in TMA3:", num_cells_tma3, "\n")
cat("Total number of cells across all TMAs:", total_cells, "\n")

```
